long_description: A tough trunk bag for work, school, shopping or wherever you pedal, the Blackburn Local Trunk Bag offer plenty of room and fold-down panniers concealed in the side pockets for extra capacity. A flip lid with an integrated mesh pocket opens to a roomy interior compartment. Removable shoulder strap eases transport, and a flasher loop offers a spot to store a safety light (not included). Compatible with all standard bike racks. When used with a Blackburn Interlock Bike Rack (sold separately), the Blackburn Local Trunk Bag can be secured on the bike with a single key.
short_description: A tough trunk bag for work, school, shopping or wherever you pedal, the Blackburn Local Trunk Bag offer plenty of room and fold-down panniers concealed in the side pockets for extra capacity.
